accurate_docstring: When in morningRoutine, set the traffic lights at Main St & 1st Ave to green, monitor pollution levels in downtown, and get a weather update. When in eveningRoutine, set the traffic lights at Main St & 1st Ave to red, send a city alert indicating that city management systems are shutting down for the night, and monitor pollution levels in downtown.
template_docstring: WHEN in morningRoutine, DO set the traffic lights at Main St & 1st Ave to green; monitor pollution levels in downtown; get a weather update; WHEN in eveningRoutine, DO set the traffic lights at Main St & 1st Ave to red; send a city alert indicating that city management systems are shutting down for the night; monitor pollution levels in downtown.

accurate_docstring: When in the morningTrafficRoutine, monitor the traffic flow in zone1. If the congestion is greater than 70%, adjust the traffic lights to extend the green light. Alert the traffic control center that the morning traffic management is completed. When in the afternoonTrafficRoutine, monitor the traffic flow in zone2. If there are more than 2 accidents, alert the traffic control center about the high accident rate in zone2. Alert the traffic control center that the afternoon traffic management is completed. When in the eveningTrafficRoutine, monitor the traffic flow in zone3. If the pedestrian volume is greater than 100, adjust the traffic lights to increase walk time. Alert the traffic control center that the evening traffic management is completed.
template_docstring: WHEN in the morningTrafficRoutine, DO monitor the traffic flow in zone1; IF the congestion is greater than 70%, THEN adjust the traffic lights to extend the green light; alert the traffic control center that the morning traffic management is completed; WHEN in the afternoonTrafficRoutine, DO monitor the traffic flow in zone2; IF there are more than 2 accidents, THEN alert the traffic control center about the high accident rate in zone2; alert the traffic control center that the afternoon traffic management is completed; WHEN in the eveningTrafficRoutine, DO monitor the traffic flow in zone3; IF the pedestrian volume is greater than 100, THEN adjust the traffic lights to increase walk time; alert the traffic control center that the evening traffic management is completed.

accurate_docstring: When in the morningParkingRoutine, monitor the parking occupancy in zone1. If the occupancy is greater than 80%, guide vehicles to the overflow parking. Notify parking management that the morning parking check is completed. When in the afternoonParkingRoutine, monitor the parking occupancy in zone2. If the occupancy is less than 20%, guide vehicles to the main parking. Notify parking management that the afternoon parking check is completed. When in the eveningParkingRoutine, monitor the parking occupancy in zone3. If the occupancy is 100%, notify parking management that zone3 parking is full. Notify parking management that the evening parking check is completed.
template_docstring: WHEN in the morningParkingRoutine, DO monitor the parking occupancy in zone1; IF the occupancy is greater than 80%, THEN guide vehicles to the overflow parking; notify parking management that the morning parking check is completed; WHEN in the afternoonParkingRoutine, DO monitor the parking occupancy in zone2; IF the occupancy is less than 20%, THEN guide vehicles to the main parking; notify parking management that the afternoon parking check is completed; WHEN in the eveningParkingRoutine, DO monitor the parking occupancy in zone3; IF the occupancy is 100%, THEN notify parking management that zone3 parking is full; notify parking management that the evening parking check is completed.

accurate_docstring: When in the morningPollutionRoutine, monitor the air pollution levels in zone1. If PM2.5 levels are greater than 100, control emission levels to reduce. Notify the environmental agency that the morning pollution control is completed. When in the afternoonPollutionRoutine, monitor the air pollution levels in zone2. If NO2 levels are greater than 50, control emission levels to reduce. Notify the environmental agency that the afternoon pollution control is completed. When in the eveningPollutionRoutine, monitor the air pollution levels in zone3. If CO levels are greater than 30, control emission levels to reduce. Notify the environmental agency that the evening pollution control is completed.
template_docstring: WHEN in the morningPollutionRoutine, DO monitor the air pollution levels in zone1; IF PM2.5 levels are greater than 100, THEN control emission levels to reduce; notify the environmental agency that the morning pollution control is completed; WHEN in the afternoonPollutionRoutine, DO monitor the air pollution levels in zone2; IF NO2 levels are greater than 50, THEN control emission levels to reduce; notify the environmental agency that the afternoon pollution control is completed; WHEN in the eveningPollutionRoutine, DO monitor the air pollution levels in zone3; IF CO levels are greater than 30, THEN control emission levels to reduce; notify the environmental agency that the evening pollution control is completed.

accurate_docstring: When in the morningTrafficLightRoutine, monitor the traffic flow and pedestrian count at intersection1. If the traffic flow is greater than 1000 vehicles per hour, adjust the traffic light timing to 30 seconds. Otherwise, set it to 20 seconds. If the pedestrian count is greater than 100, activate the pedestrian crossing signal. Notify the traffic control center that the morning traffic light routine is completed. In the afternoonTrafficLightRoutine, monitor the traffic flow and pedestrian count at intersection2. If the traffic flow is greater than 1500 vehicles per hour, adjust the traffic light timing to 40 seconds. Otherwise, set it to 25 seconds. If the pedestrian count is greater than 200, activate the pedestrian crossing signal. Notify the traffic control center that the afternoon traffic light routine is completed. In the eveningTrafficLightRoutine, monitor the traffic flow and pedestrian count at intersection3. If the traffic flow is greater than 1200 vehicles per hour, adjust the traffic light timing to 35 seconds. Otherwise, set it to 20 seconds. If the pedestrian count is greater than 150, activate the pedestrian crossing signal. Notify the traffic control center that the evening traffic light routine is completed.
template_docstring: WHEN in the morningTrafficLightRoutine, DO monitor the traffic flow and pedestrian count at intersection1; IF the traffic flow is greater than 1000 vehicles per hour, THEN adjust the traffic light timing to 30 seconds; OTHERWISE, set it to 20 seconds; IF the pedestrian count is greater than 100, THEN activate the pedestrian crossing signal; notify the traffic control center that the morning traffic light routine is completed; WHEN in the afternoonTrafficLightRoutine, DO monitor the traffic flow and pedestrian count at intersection2; IF the traffic flow is greater than 1500 vehicles per hour, THEN adjust the traffic light timing to 40 seconds; OTHERWISE, set it to 25 seconds; IF the pedestrian count is greater than 200, THEN activate the pedestrian crossing signal; notify the traffic control center that the afternoon traffic light routine is completed; WHEN in the eveningTrafficLightRoutine, DO monitor the traffic flow and pedestrian count at intersection3; IF the traffic flow is greater than 1200 vehicles per hour, THEN adjust the traffic light timing to 35 seconds; OTHERWISE, set it to 20 seconds; IF the pedestrian count is greater than 150, THEN activate the pedestrian crossing signal; notify the traffic control center that the evening traffic light routine is completed.

accurate_docstring: When in the morningParkingRoutine, monitor the parking occupancy and parking violations at lot1. If the occupancy is greater than 80%, adjust the parking pricing to $5 per hour. Otherwise, set it to $3 per hour. If there are more than 5 violations, dispatch parking enforcement. Notify the parking management that the morning parking routine is completed. In the afternoonParkingRoutine, monitor the parking occupancy and parking violations at lot2. If the occupancy is greater than 90%, adjust the parking pricing to $6 per hour. Otherwise, set it to $4 per hour. If there are more than 10 violations, dispatch parking enforcement. Notify the parking management that the afternoon parking routine is completed. In the eveningParkingRoutine, monitor the parking occupancy and parking violations at lot3. If the occupancy is greater than 85%, adjust the parking pricing to $5 per hour. Otherwise, set it to $3 per hour. If there are more than 7 violations, dispatch parking enforcement. Notify the parking management that the evening parking routine is completed.
template_docstring: WHEN in the morningParkingRoutine, DO monitor the parking occupancy and parking violations at lot1; IF the occupancy is greater than 80%, THEN adjust the parking pricing to $5 per hour; OTHERWISE, set it to $3 per hour; IF there are more than 5 violations, THEN dispatch parking enforcement; notify the parking management that the morning parking routine is completed; WHEN in the afternoonParkingRoutine, DO monitor the parking occupancy and parking violations at lot2; IF the occupancy is greater than 90%, THEN adjust the parking pricing to $6 per hour; OTHERWISE, set it to $4 per hour; IF there are more than 10 violations, THEN dispatch parking enforcement; notify the parking management that the afternoon parking routine is completed; WHEN in the eveningParkingRoutine, DO monitor the parking occupancy and parking violations at lot3; IF the occupancy is greater than 85%, THEN adjust the parking pricing to $5 per hour; OTHERWISE, set it to $3 per hour; IF there are more than 7 violations, THEN dispatch parking enforcement; notify the parking management that the evening parking routine is completed.

accurate_docstring: When in morningTrafficRoutine, monitor traffic congestion in downtown, adjust traffic flow if congestion is above 70% by setting traffic lights to green. When in afternoonTrafficRoutine, monitor traffic congestion in midtown, adjust traffic flow if congestion is above 70% by setting traffic lights to green. When in eveningTrafficRoutine, monitor traffic congestion in uptown, adjust traffic flow if congestion is above 70% by setting traffic lights to green, and prioritize an emergency vehicle (ambulance) on the main road.
template_docstring: WHEN in morningTrafficRoutine, DO monitor traffic congestion in downtown; IF congestion is above 70%, THEN adjust traffic flow by setting traffic lights to green; WHEN in afternoonTrafficRoutine, DO monitor traffic congestion in midtown; IF congestion is above 70%, THEN adjust traffic flow by setting traffic lights to green; WHEN in eveningTrafficRoutine, DO monitor traffic congestion in uptown; IF congestion is above 70%, THEN adjust traffic flow by setting traffic lights to green, and prioritize an emergency vehicle (ambulance) on the main road.

accurate_docstring: When in the morningFootTrafficRoutine, monitor the foot traffic in store1. If the foot traffic is greater than 100, adjust the store layout to an open layout. Notify the store planner that the morning foot traffic management is completed. When in the afternoonFootTrafficRoutine, monitor the foot traffic in store2. If the foot traffic is greater than 200, adjust the store layout to wide aisles. Notify the store planner that the afternoon foot traffic management is completed. When in the eveningFootTrafficRoutine, monitor the foot traffic in store3. If the foot traffic is less than 50, adjust the store layout to a compact layout. Notify the store planner that the evening foot traffic management is completed.
template_docstring: WHEN in the morningFootTrafficRoutine, DO monitor the foot traffic in store1; IF the foot traffic is greater than 100, THEN adjust the store layout to an open layout; notify the store planner that the morning foot traffic management is completed; WHEN in the afternoonFootTrafficRoutine, DO monitor the foot traffic in store2; IF the foot traffic is greater than 200, THEN adjust the store layout to wide aisles; notify the store planner that the afternoon foot traffic management is completed; WHEN in the eveningFootTrafficRoutine, DO monitor the foot traffic in store3; IF the foot traffic is less than 50, THEN adjust the store layout to a compact layout; notify the store planner that the evening foot traffic management is completed.
